info.name: Google - udscbt
info.description: The style for google search made by udscbt.
info.additionalInfo:
Note that the style is currently under development, and this version is only a best-effort preview.

Planned features in the future:
- Dark theme
- Customized wallpaper
- Broader support on image search, news, maps and others.
- Further polishing the details

data.title: the background can be more a little dark
G icon is in the wrong place!!
